availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Consisted of Shelby, Spencer, Anderson, Bullitt, Nelson, Washington, Marion, Larue, Hardin, Meade, Taylor, Green, Adair, and Casey counties in the west central area of Kentucky. Represented by William Clayton Anderson from 1859-1861 and Aaron Harding from 1861-1865.

ab.bibl:
History, Art & Archives, U.S. House of Representatives, “ANDERSON, William Clayton,” https://history.house.gov/People/Listing/A/ANDERSON,-William-Clayton-(A000237)/ (Accessed May 09, 2019).

"Chapter 913," Acts of the General Assembly of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, (Frankfort, Ky.: George D. Prentice, State Printer, 1861, 1862 and 1863), 348-349.
“Congressional and Judicial District Maps, Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition, http://discovery.civilwargovernors.org/congressional-and-judicial-district-maps (accessed April 2, 2020).
